Class ConstructionReportImpl

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.constructa.service.ConstructionReportImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstructionReportService
@Service public class ConstructionReportImpl extends Object implements ConstructionReportService
Service class that handles construction reports.
